title: Tools
description: About Blue Shark Friends and the co-founders, Hannah Parker and Josie Stewart. A company run by two disabled trans women to serve the transgender community. BIPOC led, Black led
about_tools: These are the tools currently available in the Shivernet Toolkit:

tools.name: Shiver Dock
tools.description: Shiver Dock generates single-page Node apps that act as personal sites.
